roleset.name: give spiritual meaning to; elevate or cleanse in allusion to christ

example.name: give spiritual meaning to
example.text: I spiritualize nature, saturating it with inner ideality.

example.name: elevate in allusion to Christ
example.text: [PRO] spiritualizing the senses does not mean transcending them.

example.name: cleanse or purify
example.text: During his stay at the ashhram, he was spiritualized.
example.arg: During his stay at the ashhram,

roleset.note: SPIRITUALIZE-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of propbank, verbnet, and sense groupings. No verbnet class. No framenet mapping. Framed by Katie. (from spiritualize.01-v)
